modName: Marriage Clothing dress and undress bat
summary:
Give you Marriage Clothing to you and you can dress and undress per bat
Update work for you and for Follower
descriptionHtml:
use is simpel
1.
copy files 
dress 
undress
undressall

to you TESV.exe
2.
start game and open console
^
and you have 3 option

bat dress
bat undress 
bat undressall

this undress will not remove you new clothing
you can edit this simpel txt files

Sorry for my bad english ^ ^

have fun cobrelon :)
